LanguageData.CynapseCustomAdulthood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent almost all of [PAWN_possessive] time indoors, away from other humans. To survive, [PAWN_pronoun] trained and sold messenger rats.
LanguageData.CynapseCustomAdulthood.title: hermit
LanguageData.CynapseCustomChildhood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time disassembling and reassembling electronic devices in order to figure out how they function. [PAWN_nameDef] became so preoccupied with [PAWN_possessive] tinkering that [PAWN_pronoun] forgot to develop social relationships with other humans.
LanguageData.CynapseCustomChildhood.title: tinkerer
LanguageData.FeyCustomAdulthood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent all [PAWN_possessive] time running tabletop role-playing games as a way to connect socially with others. The game changed every year, and other players always loved [PAWN_possessive] worldbuilding and stories.
LanguageData.FeyCustomAdulthood.title: game master
LanguageData.FeyCustomChildhood.description: Growing up sheltered in an urbworld archology, [PAWN_nameDef] distracted [PAWN_objective]self by playing wargames and painting miniatures. While [PAWN_pronoun] was never very good at the game itself, it helped to connect [PAWN_objective] with others.
LanguageData.FeyCustomChildhood.title: wargame fanatic
LanguageData.JoeCustomAdulthood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a hobbyist game developer who lived in an endless cycle of unfinished projects and lofty ideas.
LanguageData.JoeCustomAdulthood.title: game developer
LanguageData.JoeCustomChildhood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family of musicians. When hard times came, [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to play the drum in a traveling band.
LanguageData.JoeCustomChildhood.title: drummer
LanguageData.LiamCustomAdulthood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on a peaceful glitterworld developing hyper-realistic war crime simulation software.
LanguageData.LiamCustomAdulthood.title: simulation developer
LanguageData.LiamCustomChildhood.description: Born and raised on a glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was obsessed with simulation software. [PAWN_pronoun] spent far too much time plugged in.
LanguageData.LiamCustomChildhood.title: sim addict
LanguageData.MateCustomAdulthood.description: After being laid off by an interplanetary megacorp, [PAWN_nameDef] spent several years disillusioned and fighting alcohol addiction.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] ended up busking aboard a space freighter, playing a beaten-up guitar and entertaining the crew with blues and folk songs from the distant past.
LanguageData.MateCustomAdulthood.title: busker
LanguageData.MateCustomChildhood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood dreaming of becoming a famous artist who could impress people with [PAWN_possessive] creations.
LanguageData.MateCustomChildhood.title: curious kid
LanguageData.NathanCustomAdulthood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] carved living spaces and mined minerals from the sides of hills and mountains. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to feel at home picking through rock and shoring up cave walls.
LanguageData.NathanCustomAdulthood.title: digger
LanguageData.NathanCustomChildhood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a large and intricate cave complex that extended deep into a mountainside. [PAWN_pronoun] helped the adults maintain and improve the deep caves.
LanguageData.NathanCustomChildhood.title: cave child
LanguageData.OskarCustomAdulthood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] designed combat modifications for frontline soldiers.\n\nOne night, in a nightmare, [PAWN_nameDef] was confronted by all the men and women killed by [PAWN_possessive] work. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to travel to the rimworlds and use [PAWN_possessive] skills for good.
LanguageData.OskarCustomAdulthood.title: mod designer
LanguageData.OskarCustomChildhood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on the dark edge of a tidally-locked urbworld. After an argument, [PAWN_possessive] father sold [PAWN_objective] to a local district lord as a slave artist.\n\nForced to create art or be punished, [PAWN_pronoun] withdrew and became unable to form relations with others.
LanguageData.OskarCustomChildhood.title: art slave
LanguageData.TynanCustomAdulthood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an independent game developer.\n\nAfter an early success, [PAWN_possessive] career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.
LanguageData.TynanCustomAdulthood.title: game developer
LanguageData.TynanCustomChildhood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his childhood selling knockoff cigarettes to 15-year-olds. The cigarettes were often full of grass clippings.
LanguageData.TynanCustomChildhood.title: punk
LanguageData.WillCustomAdulthood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] designed elaborate entertainment mazes for the glitterworld elite. Even now, [PAWN_pronoun] thinks of little else.
LanguageData.WillCustomAdulthood.title: labyrinth maker
LanguageData.WillCustomChildhood.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a research camp on a deadworld. [PAWN_possessive] parents were astrobiologists studying mysterious labyrinthine formations beneath the planet's crust. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of his time wandering those tunnels, wondering what otherworldly entity could have created them.
LanguageData.WillCustomChildhood.title: maze child
